text:  INTERNATIONAL STUDENT APPLICATION FORM FOR ADMISSION TO UNDERGRADUATE PROGRAMS  We are pleased that you are interested in applying to the undergraduate programs at Sabancı University.  All completed applications should be submitted to the Office of Student Resources at the address above by the deadlines announced at our web site (www.sabanciuniv.edu).  Applicants are responsible for submitting a complete application. Please make sure that all parts of your application are completed and included in your package for submission. Also, make and retain a copy of your completed application.  If you are applying to more than one program, complete a separate application form for each. (You may use a separate sheet, if necessary.) GENERAL UNDERTAKING I confirm that all the information provided on this application form is correct and true. I understand that my application or enrollment can be cancelled if the information and/or documents supplied are found to be incorrect, false or distorted. Applicant’s Signature: Date: INSTRUCTIONS FOR THE APPLICANT  All applicants should submit a certified transcript of grades for any degrees held. When you receive the sealed official transcripts from your school, do not open them.  Applications will not be completed until one of the required test results is received. Minimum scores for the tests are announced at our web site (www.sabanciuniv.edu).  Teacher Reference Forms provide an opportunity for the Admissions Committee to gain additional information about the applicant’s academic performances and capabilities. Therefore recommenders should be people who are well acquainted with the applicant’s performance and capabilities. At least one Teacher Reference Form is essential. Recommenders must fill out the letters and return them to you in an envelope sealed and signed across the seal. Recommenders are free to attach any additional sheets to the recommendation forms. When you receive the returned, sealed recommendation envelopes, do not open them.  Applications are considered valid only for the semester applied.  Applicants accepted to undergraduate programs must have a “STUDENT VISA” in order to complete the registration at Sabancı University. This visa can be obtained from a Turkish Consulate in the applicant’s home country by presenting the letter of acceptance given by the Office of Student Resources.  Sabancı University affirms that all application materials become the confidential property of the Admissions Committee and are not returnable.  Sabancı University reserves the right to make changes at any time affecting policies, fees, curricula, courses, degrees, and programs offered, or any matters cited in this package. While every effort has been made to ensure that this publication is accurate and up-to-date, it may include typographical or other errors.  For further information or guidance: Address: Sabancı University-Student Resources, Orhanlı-Tuzla, 34956 Istanbul-Turkey E-mail: studentinfo@sabanciuniv.edu Tel: +90 (216) 483 90 90  Applicant’s Checklist (please include all of the following materials in your application package): 1. The completed application form 2. Transcript(s) of the high school(s) previously attended 3. A copy of relevant test scores such as YÖS, SAT 1, TOEFL etc. 4.
